Class MessageUtils

public final class MessageUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to add various faces messages.

Author:
Gregor Schumm

addMessages

public static void addMessages(java.util.List<javax.faces.application.FacesMessage> messages)
Adds a list of global messages to the current context.

Parameters:
messages - the messages to add

addValidationMessage

public static <T> void addValidationMessage(javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<T> violation)
Adds a message to the faces context. The field name and the message are fetched from the given constraint violation.
Class properties of T have to be mapped to the JSF field IDs in field-mappings.properties.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of validated object
Parameters:
violation - the constraint violation
